mapper.delete: delete a,b from gp_resource a left join gpr_resource b on a.id=b.resource_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete a,b from gp_resource a left join gpr_resource b on a.id=b.resource_id where a.domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update gp_resource
domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

extension = #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
